description.english: Complete the tutorial, first video game unlocked.
description.french: Compléter le tutoriel.
description.italian: Completare il tutorial.
description.spanish: Completar el tutorial.
description.schinese: 完成教学
description.brazilian: Complete o tutorial.

description.english: Survival Mode unlocked.
description.french: Mode survie débloqué.
description.italian: Modo Survival sbloccato.
description.spanish: Modo Survival desbloqueado.
description.schinese: 生存模式解锁
description.brazilian: Modo Survival desbloqueado.

description.english: Beat the game.
description.french: Compléter le jeu.
description.italian: Vincere il gioco.
description.spanish: Vencer el juego.
description.schinese: 游戏通关
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo.

description.english: Get all the stars.
description.french: Obtenir toutes les étoiles.
description.italian: Prendere tutte le stelle.
description.spanish: Obtener todas las estrellas.
description.schinese: 获得所有的星星
description.brazilian: Obtenha todas as estrelas.

description.english: Get a 5 combo streak.
description.french: Faire un combo de 5.
description.italian: Fare un combo di 5.
description.spanish: Lograr un combo de 5.
description.schinese: 完成5连击
description.brazilian: Consiga um combo de 5.

description.english: Get a 20 combo streak.
description.french: Faire un combo de 20.
description.italian: Fare un combo di 20.
description.spanish: Lograr un combo de 20.
description.schinese: 完成20连击
description.brazilian: Consiga um combo de 20.

description.english: Get a 50 combo streak.
description.french: Faire un combo de 50.
description.italian: Fare un combo di 50.
description.spanish: Lograr un combo de 50.
description.schinese: 完成50连击
description.brazilian: Consiga um combo de 50.

description.english: Get a 100 combo streak.
description.french: Faire un combo de 100.
description.italian: Fare un combo di 100.
description.spanish: Lograr un combo de 100.
description.schinese: 完成100连击
description.brazilian: Consiga um combo de 100.

description.french: Tuer 500 grandes clono-cellules.

description.spanish: Matar 5000 clonocélulas chicas.

description.english: Survive 1 minute in Survival Mode.
description.french: Survivre 1 minute en mode survie.
description.italian: Sopravvivere 1 minuto in modo Survival.
description.spanish: Sobrevivir 1 minuto en el modo Survival.
description.schinese: 在生存模式中存活1分钟
description.brazilian: Sobreviva 1 minuto no modo Survival.

description.english: Survive 3 minutes in Survival Mode.
description.french: Survivre 3 minutes en mode survie.
description.italian: Sopravvivere 3 minuti in modo Survival.
description.spanish: Sobrevivir 3 minutos en el modo Survival.
description.schinese: 在生存模式中存活3分钟
description.brazilian: Sobreviva 3 minutos no modo Survival.

description.english: Survive 5 minutes in Survival Mode.
description.french: Survivre 5 minutes en mode survie.
description.italian: Sopravvivere 5 minuti in modo Survival.
description.spanish: Sobrevivir 5 minutos en el modo Survival.
description.schinese: 在生存模式中存活5分钟
description.brazilian: Sobreviva 5 minutos no modo Survival.

description.english: Survive 10 minutes in Survival Mode.
description.french: Survivre 10 minutes en mode survie.
description.italian: Sopravvivere 10 minuti in modo Survival.
description.spanish: Sobrevivir 10 minutos en el modo Survival.
description.schinese: 在生存模式中存活10分钟
description.brazilian: Sobreviva 10 minutos no modo Survival.

description.english: Summon a magic fairy.
description.french: Invoquer une fée magique.
description.italian: Invocare una fata magica.
description.spanish: Invocar un hada mágica.
description.schinese: 召唤一个魔法精灵
description.brazilian: Sumone uma fada mágica.

description.english: Destroy 10 or more clonocells with a single normal shot.
description.french: Détruire 10 clono-cellules ou plus d'un seul tir simple.
description.italian: Distruggere 10 o più clonocellule con un singolo colpo base.
description.spanish: Destruir 10 o más clonocélulas de un solo disparo simple.
description.schinese: 使用单发普通射击破坏10个以上克罗隆细胞
description.brazilian: Destrua 10 ou mais clonocélulas com um único tiro normal.

description.english: Have more than 4 lives.
description.french: Avoir plus de 4 vies.
description.italian: Avere più di 4 vite.
description.spanish: Tener más de 4 vidas.
description.schinese: 拥有大于4条命
description.brazilian: Tenha mais que 4 vidas.

description.english: Get a 30 combo streak with the machine gun.
description.french: Obtenir un combo de 30 avec la mitrailleuse.
description.italian: Fare un combo di 30 con la mitragliatrice.
description.spanish: Lograr un combo de 30 con la ametralladora.
description.schinese: 使用机枪完成30连击
description.brazilian: Consiga um combo de 30 com a meltralhadora.

description.english: Destroy 20 clonocells while time is frozen.
description.french: Détruire 20 clono-cellules lorsque le temps s'arrête.
description.italian: Distruggere 20 clonocellule mentre il tempo è fermo.
description.spanish: Destruir 20 clonocélulas mientras el tiempo está detenido.
description.schinese: 在时间暂停的情况下破坏20个克罗隆细胞
description.brazilian: Destrua 20 clonocélulas enquanto o tempo estiver pausado.

description.english: Get a 30 combo streak with the Eureka gun.
description.french: Obtenir un combo de 30 avec le pistolet Eureka.
description.italian: Fare un combo di 30 con la pistola Eureka.
description.spanish: Lograr un combo de 30 con la pistola Eureka.
description.schinese: 使用尤里卡枪完成一次30连击
description.brazilian: Consiga um combo de 30 com a pistola Eureka.

description.english: Win a level with the shield active.
description.french: Gagner un niveau avec la protection activée.
description.italian: Vincere un livello con lo scudo attivo.
description.spanish: Ganar un nivel con el escudo activado.
description.schinese: 在护盾激活的情况下通过一关
description.brazilian: Termine um nível com o escudo ativado.

description.english: Destroy 20 or more clonocells with a single laser shot.
description.french: Détruire 20 clono-cellules d'un seul coup de de laser.
description.italian: Distruggere 20 o più clonocellule con un singolo sparo laser.
description.spanish: Destruir 20 clonocélulas o más con un solo disparo láser.
description.schinese: 用一发激光弹破坏至少20个克罗隆细胞
description.brazilian: Destrua 20 ou mais clonocélulas com um único tiro de laser.

description.english: Destroy 20 clonocells while you're immune.
description.french: Détruire 20 clono-cellules lorsque tu es immunisé.
description.italian: Distruggere 20 clonocellule mentre sei immune.
description.spanish: Destruir 20 clonocélulas mientras eres inmune.
description.schinese: 在无敌状态下破坏20个克罗隆细胞
description.brazilian: Destrua 20 clonocélulas enquanto você estiver imune.

description.english: Get a 30 combo streak with the flamethrower.
description.french: Détruire 30 clono-cellules d'un seul coup de de feu.
description.italian: Distruggere 30 o più clonocellule con un singolo sparo di fuoco.
description.spanish: Lograr un combo de 30 con el lanzallamas.
description.schinese: 用火焰喷射器完成30连击
description.brazilian: Consiga um combo de 30 com o lança chamas.

description.english: Destroy 20 clonocells with a bomb.
description.french: Détruire 20 clono-cellules avec une bombe.
description.italian: Distruggere 20 clonocellule con la bomba.
description.spanish: Destruir 20 clonocélulas con la bomba.
description.schinese: 使用一个炸弹摧毁20个克罗隆细胞
description.brazilian: Destrua 20 clonocélulas com uma bomba.

description.english: Get a 30 combo streak with the Havoc gun.
description.french: Obtenir un combo de 30 avec le pistolet Havoc.
description.italian: Fare un combo di 30 con la pistola Havoc.
description.spanish: Lograr un combo de 30 con la pistola Havoc.
description.schinese: 使用破坏枪完成30连击
description.brazilian: Consiga um combo de 30 com a pistola Havoc.

description.english: Save the Blockits video game.
description.french: Sauver le jeu vidéo Blockits.
description.italian: Salvare il videogioco Blockits.
description.spanish: Salvar el videojuego Blockits.
description.schinese: 拯救*俄罗斯方块游戏
description.brazilian: Salve o jogo Blockits.

description.english: Win a level without getting hit by a block in the Blockits game.
description.french: Dans le Blockits, gagner un niveau sans être touché par un bloc.
description.italian: Vincere un livello a Blockits senza essere colpito da un blocco.
description.spanish: Ganar un nivel sin ser tocado por un bloque en el Blockits.
description.schinese: 在俄罗斯方块游戏中，通过一关且不被砖块击中
description.brazilian: Vença um nível sem ser atingido pelos blocos no Blockits.

description.english: Destroy every different Blockits block.
description.french: Détruire chaque type de bloc du Blockits.
description.italian: Distruggere ogni tipo di blocco di Blockits.
description.spanish: Destruir cada tipo de bloques del Blockits.
description.schinese: 破坏每种俄罗斯方块
description.brazilian: Destrua todos os tipos de blocos do Blockits.

description.english: Save the Arkadroid video game.
description.french: Sauver le jeu vidéo Arkadroid.
description.italian: Salvare il videogioco Arkadroid.
description.spanish: Salvar el videojuego Arkadroid.
description.schinese: 拯救*打砖块游戏
description.brazilian: Salve o jogo Arkadroid.

description.english: Win a level with a large ship in the Arkadroid game.
description.french: Dans l'Arkadroid, gagner un niveau avec le vaisseau long.
description.italian: Vincere un livello all'Arkadroid con la nave lunga.
description.spanish: Ganar un nivel con la nave larga en el Arkadroid.
description.schinese: 在一局打砖块游戏中，使用大号板获得胜利
description.brazilian: Termine um nível com uma prancha longo no Arkadroid.

description.english: Destroy 2000 Arkadroid blocks.
description.french: Détruire 2000 blocs de l'Arkadroid.
description.italian: Distruggere 2000 blocchi all'Arkadroid.
description.spanish: Destruir 2000 bloques del Arkadroid.
description.schinese: 打掉2000个砖块
description.brazilian: Destrua 2000 blocos do Arkadroid.

description.english: Save the Wonderland video game.
description.french: Sauver le jeu vidéo Wonderland.

description.spanish: Salvar el videojuego Wonderland.
description.schinese: 拯救*神奇小子游戏
description.brazilian: Salve o jogo Wonderland.

description.english: Win a level without getting hit by an axe in the Wonderland game.
description.french: Dans le Wonderland, gagner un niveau sans être touché par une hache.
description.italian: Vincere un livello a Wonderland senza essere colpito da un ascia.
description.spanish: Ganar un nivel sin ser tocado por un hacha en el Wonderland.
description.schinese: 在神奇小子游戏中，通过一关且不被斧子击中
description.brazilian: Termine um nível sem ser atingido por um machado no Wonderland.

description.english: Win a level without shooting cells in the Wonderland game.
description.french: Dans le Wonderland, gagner un niveau sans tirer sur les cellules.
description.italian: Vincere un livello a Wonderland senza sparare alle cellule.
description.spanish: Ganar un nivel sin dispararle a las células en el Wonderland.
description.schinese: 在神奇小子游戏中，通过一关且全程不射击细胞
description.brazilian: Termine um nível de Wonderland sem atirar nas células.

description.english: Save the Pillman video game.

description.english: Win a level using only two pills in the Pillman game.
description.french: Gagner un niveau en utilisant que deux pilules dans le Pillman.
description.italian: Vincere un livello a Pillman usando soltanto due pillole.
description.spanish: Ganar un nivel usando sólo dos píldoras en el Pillman.
description.schinese: 在吃药人游戏中，仅使用两片药通过一关
description.brazilian: Termine um nível usando apenas 2 pílulas no Pillman.

description.english: Go around a Pillman level 5 times in the same direction.
description.french: Faire le tour d'un niveau du Pillman 5 fois dans la même direction.
description.italian: Fare il giro di un livello di Pillman 5 volte nella stessa direzione.
description.spanish: Dar la vuelta a un nivel del Pillman 5 veces en la misma dirección.
description.schinese: 在吃药人的关卡中，按同一方向绕5圈
description.brazilian: De a volta em um nível do Pillman 5 vezes na mesma direçao.

description.french: Dans le Snow Sises, enlever la neige de 2000 clono-cellules.
description.italian: Rimuovere la neve a 2000 clonocellule su Snow Sises.

description.english: Win a level without getting hit by a dragon in the Kung-Fu Blaster game.

displayName.english: With fists as fast as lightning
displayName.italian: Con colpi veloci come il fulmine
displayName.brazilian: Com punhos rápidos como um raio

description.english: Destroy 200 Kung-Fu Blaster jars before they explode.
description.french: Détruire 200 vases du Kung-Fu Blaster avant qu'ils n'explosent.
description.italian: Distruggere 200 vasi di Kung-Fu Blaster prima che essi esplodano.
description.spanish: Destruir 200 jarrones del Kung-Fu Blaster antes de que exploten.
description.schinese: 在功夫之王中，在爆炸前破坏200个罐子

description.english: Win a level without getting hit by the ball in the Boing game.
description.french: Dans le Boing, gagner un niveau sans être touché par la balle.
description.italian: Vincere un livello a Boing senza essere colpito dalla palla.
description.spanish: Ganar un nivel sin ser tocado por la pelota en el Boing.
description.schinese: 在嘣游戏中，通过一关且不被球击中

description.english: Win during a draw in the Boing game.
description.french: Dans le Boing, gagner en faisant match nul.
description.italian: Vincere durante un pareggio a Boing.
description.spanish: Ganar con un empate en el Boing.
description.schinese: 在嘣游戏中，在一场平局中获胜
description.brazilian: Termine um nível durante un empate no Boing.

description.english: Save the Monkey Gong video game.

description.italian: Salvare il videogioco Monkey Gong.
description.spanish: Salvar el videojuego Monkey Gong.
description.schinese: 拯救*大金刚游戏
description.brazilian: Salve o jogo Monkey Gong.

description.english: Win a level without getting hit by the flames in the Monkey Gong game.
description.french: Dans le Monkey Gong, gagner un niveau sans être touché par les flammes.
description.italian: Vincere un livello a Moneky Gong senza essere colpito dalle fiamme.
description.spanish: Ganar un nivel sin ser tocado por las llamas en el Monkey Gong.
description.schinese: 在大金刚中通过一关，且不被火焰击中
description.brazilian: Termine um nível sem ser pelas chamas no Monkey Gong.

description.english: Destroy 1000 platforms in the Monkey Gong game.
description.french: Détruire 1000 plate-formes du Monkey Gong.
description.italian: Distruggere 1000 piattaforme al Monkey Gong.
description.spanish: Destruir 1000 plataformas en el Monkey Gong.
description.schinese: 在大金刚中破坏1000个平台
description.brazilian: Destrua 1000 plataformas no Monkey Gong.

displayName.english: Go Play with Pissed Off Birds!
displayName.french: Va jouer avec des oiseaux fachés !
displayName.italian: Va' a Giocare con gli Uccelli Arrabbiati!
displayName.spanish: Vete a Jugar con Aves Enojadas!

description.english: Lose in the first level of the first game.
description.french: Perdre dans le premier niveau du premier jeu vidéo.
description.italian: Perdere al primo livello del primo videogioco.
description.spanish: Perder en el primer nivel del primer juego.
description.schinese: 在第一个游戏的第一关中失败
description.brazilian: Perca no primeiro nível do primeiro jogo.

description.english: Survive less than 30 seconds in Survival Mode.
description.french: Survivre moins de 30 secondes en mode survie.
description.italian: Sopravvivere meno di 30 secondi in modo Survival.
description.spanish: Sobrevivir menos de 30 segundos en el modo Survival.
description.schinese: 在生存模式中存活小于30秒
description.brazilian: Sobreviva menos de 30 segundos no modo Survival.

description.english: Lose all your lives in a Blockits level due to the blocks.
description.french: Les blocs du Blockits te font perdre toutes tes vies.
description.italian: Perdere tutte le tue vite sotto i blocchi di Blockits.
description.spanish: Perder todas tus vidas ante los bloques en el Blockits.
description.schinese: 在打砖块关卡中，因砖块损失掉所有生命
description.brazilian: Perca todas as suas vidas por causa dos blocos em um nível del Blockits.

description.english: Lose all your lives in a Wonderland level due to the axes.
description.french: Les haches te font perdre toutes tes vies.
description.italian: Perdere tutte le tue vite sotto le asce di Wonderland.
description.spanish: Perder todas tus vidas a mano de las hachas del Wonderland.
description.schinese: 在神奇小子关卡中，因斧子损失掉所有生命
description.brazilian: Perca todas as suas vidas por causa dos machados em um nível de Wonderland.

description.english: Lose all your lives in a Snow Sises level due to the snowy cells.
description.french: Les clono-cellules enneigées du Snow Sises te font perdre toutes tes vies.
description.italian: Perdere tutte le tue vite a mano delle clonocellule gelate su Snow Sises.
description.spanish: Perder todas tus vidas a mano de las clonocélulas nevadas del Snow Sises.
description.schinese: 在雪人姐妹游戏中，因雪细胞损失掉所有生命
description.brazilian: Perca todas as suas vidas por causa das células de neve em um nível de Snow Sises.

description.english: Lose all your lives in a Kung-Fu Blaster level due to the dragons.
description.french: Les dragons du Kung-Fu Blaster te font perdre toutes tes vies.
description.italian: Perdere tutte le tue vite a causa dei draghi del Kung-Fu Blaster.
description.spanish: Perder todas tus vidas a mano de los dragones del Kung-Fu Blaster.
description.schinese: 在功夫之王中，因龙而损失掉所有生命
description.brazilian: Perca todas as suas vidas por causa dos dragões em um nível de Kung-Fu Blaster.

description.english: Lose all your lives in a Boing level due to the ball and rackets.
description.french: La balle et les raquettes du Boing te font perdre toutes tes vies.
description.italian: Perdere tutte le tue vite sotto la palla e le racchette del Boing.
description.spanish: Perder todas tus vidas a mano de la pelota y las raquetas del Boing.
description.schinese: 在嘣的关卡中，因球和球拍而损失掉所有生命
description.brazilian: Perca todas as suas vidas por causa das raquetes e da bola em um nível de Boing.

description.english: Lose all your lives in a Monkey Gong level due to the flames.
description.french: Les flammes du Monkey Gong te font perdre toutes tes vies.
description.italian: Perdere tutte le tue vite sotto le fiamme di Monkey Gong.
description.spanish: Perder todas tus vidas a causa de las llamas del Monkey Gong.
description.schinese: 在大金刚中，因火焰而损失掉所有生命
description.brazilian: Perca todas as suas vidas por causa das chamas em um nível de Monkey Gong.

description.english: Die 3 consecutive times in a Blockits level.
description.french: Perdre 3 fois de suite dans un niveau du Blockits.
description.italian: Perdere tre volte di seguito ad un livello di Blockits.
description.spanish: Morir 3 veces seguidas en un nivel del Blockits.
description.schinese: 在俄罗斯方块关卡中连续死3次
description.brazilian: Morra 3 vezes seguidas em um nível de Blockits.

description.english: Die 3 consecutive times in an Arkadroid level.
description.french: Perdre 3 fois de suite dans un niveau de l'Arkadroid.
description.italian: Perdere tre volte di seguito ad un livello di Arkadroid.
description.spanish: Morir 3 veces seguidas en un nivel del Arkadroid.
description.schinese: 爆破 在爆破陨石的关卡中连续死3次
description.brazilian: Morra 3 vezes seguidas em um nível de Arkadroid.

description.english: Die 3 consecutive times in a Wonderland level.
description.french: Perdre 3 fois de suite dans un niveau du Wonderland.
description.italian: Perdere tre volte di seguito ad un livello di Wonderland.
description.spanish: Morir 3 veces seguidas en un nivel del Wonderland.
description.schinese: 在神奇小子的关卡中连续死3次
description.brazilian: Morra 3 vezes seguidas em um nível de Wonderland.

description.english: Die 3 consecutive times in a Pillman level.
description.french: Perdre 3 fois de suite dans un niveau du Pillman.
description.italian: Perdere tre volte di seguito ad un livello di Pillman.
description.spanish: Morir 3 veces seguidas en un nivel del Pillman.
description.schinese: 在吃药人的关卡中连续死3次
description.brazilian: Morra 3 vezes seguidas em um nível de Pillman.

description.english: Die 3 consecutive times in a Snow Sises level.
description.french: Perdre 3 fois de suite dans un niveau du Snow Sises.
description.italian: Perdere tre volte di seguito ad un livello di Snow Sises.
description.spanish: Morir 3 veces seguidas en un nivel del Snow Sises.
description.schinese: 在雪人姐妹的关卡中连续死3次
description.brazilian: Morra 3 vezes seguidas em um nível de Snow Sises.

description.english: Die 3 consecutive times in a Kung-Fu Blaster level.
description.french: Perdre 3 fois de suite dans un niveau du Kung-Fu Blaster.
description.italian: Perdere tre volte di seguito ad un livello di Kung-Fu Blaster
description.spanish: Morir 3 veces seguidas en un nivel del Kung-Fu Blaster.
description.schinese: 在功夫之王的关卡中连续死3次
description.brazilian: Morra 3 vezes seguidas em um nível de Kung-Fu Blaster.

description.english: Die 3 consecutive times in a Boing level.
description.french: Perdre 3 fois de suite dans un niveau du Boing.
description.italian: Perdere tre volte di seguito ad un livello di Boing.
description.spanish: Morir 3 veces seguidas en un nivel del Boing.
description.schinese: 在嘣的关卡中连续死3次
description.brazilian: Morra 3 vezes seguidas em um nível de Boing.

description.english: Die 3 consecutive times in a Monkey Gong level.
description.french: Perdre 3 fois de suite dans un niveau du Monkey Gong.
description.italian: Perdere tre volte di seguito ad un livello di Monkey Gong.
description.spanish: Morir 3 veces seguidas en un nivel del Monkey Gong.
description.schinese: 在大金刚的关卡中连续死3次
description.brazilian: Morra 3 vezes seguidas em um nível de Monkey Gong.

description.english: Survival Coop Mode unlocked.
description.french: Mode Survie Coop débloqué.
description.italian: Modo Survival Coop sbloccato.
description.spanish: Modo Survival Coop desbloqueado.
description.schinese: 合作生存模式解锁
description.brazilian: Modo Survival Coop desbloqueado.

description.english: Beat all the levels in Hardcore Mode.
description.french: Gagner tous les niveaux en mode hardcore.
description.italian: Sconfiggere tutti i livelli nella modalità hardcore.
description.spanish: Vencer todos los niveles en modo hardcore.
description.schinese: 在硬核模式下通过所有关卡
description.brazilian: Termine todos os níveis no modo Hardcore.

description.english: Get the first upgrade to the Arcade Gun.
description.french: Obtenir la première mise à niveau du pistolet Arcade.
description.italian: Ottenere il primo upgrade per la pistola Arcade.
description.spanish: Conseguir la primera mejora de la pistola Arcade.
description.schinese: 捡到第一个破坏枪子弹
description.brazilian: Obtenha o primeiro upgrade para a pistola Arcade.

description.english: Get the second upgrade to the Arcade Gun.
description.french: Obtenir la deuxième mise à niveau du pistolet Arcade.
description.italian: Ottenere il secondo upgrade per la pistola Arcade.
description.spanish: Conseguir la segunda mejora de la pistola Arcade.
description.schinese: 捡到第二个破坏枪子弹
description.brazilian: Obtenha o secondo upgrade para a pistola Arcade.

description.english: Survive 1 minute in Survival Coop Mode.
description.french: Survivre 1 minute en mode Survie Coop.
description.italian: Sopravvivere 1 minuto in modo Survival Coop.
description.spanish: Sobrevivir 1 minuto en el modo Survival Coop.
description.schinese: 在合作生存模式中存活1分钟
description.brazilian: Sobreviva 1 minuto no modo Survival Coop.

description.english: Survive 3 minute in Survival Coop Mode.
description.french: Survivre 3 minutes en mode Survie Coop.
description.italian: Sopravvivere 3 minuti in modo Survival Coop.
description.spanish: Sobrevivir 3 minutos en el modo Survival Coop.
description.schinese: 在合作生存模式中存活3分钟
description.brazilian: Sobreviva 3 minutos no modo Survival Coop.

description.english: Survive 5 minute in Survival Coop Mode.
description.french: Survivre 5 minutes en mode Survie Coop.
description.italian: Sopravvivere 5 minuti in modo Survival Coop.
description.spanish: Sobrevivir 5 minutos en el modo Survival Coop.
description.schinese: 在合作生存模式中存活5分钟
description.brazilian: Sobreviva 5 minutos no modo Survival Coop.

description.english: Survive 10 minute in Survival Coop Mode.
description.french: Survivre 10 minutes en mode Survie Coop.
description.italian: Sopravvivere 10 minuti in modo Survival Coop.
description.spanish: Sobrevivir 10 minutos en el modo Survival Coop.
description.schinese: 在合作生存模式中存活10分钟
description.brazilian: Sobreviva 10 minutos no modo Survival Coop.

description.english: Beat the ClonoBoss in Hardcore Mode.
description.french: Battre le Clono-Boss en mode hardcore.
description.italian: Sconfiggere il Clonoboss nella modalità hardcore.
description.spanish: Vencer al Clonojefe en modo hardcore.
description.schinese: 在困难模式中击败克罗隆Boss
description.brazilian: Derrote o Clonochefe no modo Hardcore.

description.english: Collect 100 clovers for St. Patrick's Day
description.spanish: Coleccionar 100 tréboles por el Día de San Patricio
